verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: In 2016] [ARG0: Hoosiers] [V: voted] [ARGM-MNR: overwhelmingly] [ARG1: for Trump to be U.S. president] but five years earlier he was deemed unfit to drive the Indy 500 pace car .
